title: conferred on me by sections 5 and 31 (amended by section 34 of the Health Act
heading: 1. These Regulations may be cited as the Infectious Diseases (Amendment)
text_raw:
1. These Regulations may be cited as the Infectious Diseases (Amendment) 

Regulations 2021.
text_norm: 1 regulation may cited infectious disease (amendment) regulation 2021

title: conferred on me by sections 5 and 31 (amended by section 34 of the Health Act
heading: 2. The Infectious Diseases Regulations 1981 (S.I. No. 390 of 1981) are
text_raw:
2. The Infectious Diseases Regulations 1981 (S.I. No. 390 of 1981) are 

amended – 

(a) 

in Regulation 2 (amended by Regulation 4(1) of the Infectious 
Diseases (Amendment) Regulations 2007 (S.I. No. 559 of 2007)) 
by the insertion of the following definition: 

“ ‘registered pharmacist’ means a person registered in a register 
set up under section 13 of the Pharmacy Act 2007 (No. 20 of 
2007)”, and 

(b) 

in paragraph (c) of Regulation 13(1) (amended by Regulation 4(5) 
of the Infectious Diseases (Amendment) Regulations 2007 (S.I. 
No. 559 of 2007)) by the insertion of “or any registered 
pharmacist” after “a functional area of the Health Service 
Executive”. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

27 January, 2021. 

STEPHEN DONNELLY, 
Minister for Health. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 2nd February, 2021. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [26] 3

title: conferred on me by sections 5 and 31 (amended by section 34 of the Health Act
heading: (This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation.) 

These Regulations amend paragraph (c) of Regulation 13(1) (as amended) of the 
Infectious Diseases Regulations 1981 (S.I. No. 390 of 1981) to provide for the 
supply from the Health Service Executive to registered pharmacists of such 
agents as per that regulation. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 4 [26]
